machine_ip.name: Machine IP Address
machine_ip.description: The IP address or hostname of your Meticulous Espresso machine (e.g., 192.168.1.100 or meticulous.local)

scan_interval.name: Scan Interval
scan_interval.description: How often to poll the machine for updates (in seconds)

refresh_rate_minutes.name: Sensor Refresh Rate
refresh_rate_minutes.description: How often to refresh sensor state in minutes (recommended: 5-10). Higher values reduce system load.

debug.name: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable detailed debug logging for troubleshooting

mqtt_username.name: MQTT Username
mqtt_username.description: Optional username for MQTT broker (auto-detected from HA MQTT integration)

mqtt_password.name: MQTT Password
mqtt_password.description: Optional password for MQTT broker (auto-detected from HA MQTT integration)
